label: Teeth Whitening
description: Products and services related to teeth whitening.
intents: Find the best teeth whitening products

subcategories.label: Whitening Strips
subcategories.description: Thin, flexible strips coated with a peroxide-based gel that stick to teeth to whiten them.

subcategories.label: Whitening Toothpaste
subcategories.description: Toothpaste that contains abrasives and/or peroxide to remove surface stains and whiten teeth.
subtopics: Colgate optic white toothbrush and whitening pen

subcategories.label: Professional Teeth Whitening
subcategories.description: Teeth whitening services provided by a dentist or other professional.

subcategories.label: At-Home Teeth Whitening Kits
subcategories.description: Kits that allow users to whiten their teeth at home, usually with a tray and a peroxide-based gel.

subcategories.label: Teeth Whitening Products
subcategories.description: Products other than strips, toothpaste, or kits that are designed to whiten teeth.
